ygData.subject: any advice for a stupid and lost druid?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, since I m now lvl 33, I ve been in Overthere. Except--stupid me--I forgot to rebind myself, so I m not at the FM/Ill Omen zone. I can t get to the OT
ygData.messageBody:
Well, since I'm now lvl 33, I've been in
Overthere. Except--stupid me--I forgot to rebind myself, so
I'm not at the FM/Ill Omen zone. I can't get to the
OT zone again to save my life (and sometimes
literally) and I really want 34 . . . Could anyone either
help me figure out how to get there, or tell me
another good place to level? Thanks for any advice you
can give me.<br><br>Feeling really
stupid,<br>Kanissa, on Rodcet Nife.
